scripts.tsc: tsc && tsc -p tsconfig.react.cjs.json && tsc -p tsconfig.react.umd.json && tsc -p tsconfig.react-dom.cjs.json && tsc -p tsconfig.react-dom.umd.json
scripts.publish:stable: cd react && bun publish && cd ../react-dom && bun publish
scripts.publish:experimental: cd react && bun publish --tag experimental && cd ../react-dom && bun publish --tag experimental
